EmailTemplate.name: RE: $15,000 off Turbo for AACPS (1494941259.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: $15,000 off Turbo for AACPS (1494941259.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean DocumentEmail false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Thank you for getting back to me, Greg. Is that because you are aware of the platform and already know the capabilities or is it just a bad time of year? From: Barlow, Greg [mailto:GBARLOW@AACPS.org] Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2017 9:25 AM To: James Wilcox <james.wilcox@turbonomic.com> Subject: RE: $15,000 off Turbo for AACPS No thanks. From: James Wilcox [mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>] Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2017 9:24 AM To: Barlow, Greg <GBARLOW@AACPS.org <[[mailto:GBARLOW@AACPS.org]]>> Subject: $15,000 off Turbo for AACPS Greg - I’m reaching out with a special offer for state and local government organizations as we approach the summer months. I’ve worked with a number of governmental institutions including the Virginia Beach City Public Schools, and Fairfax County Public Schools to alleviate their IT infrastructure management challenges. They generally run within a June/July budget cycle and occasionally have remaining funds towards the end of their fiscal year. I typically find these customers bear one of two prevalent problems: - Their IT environments are highly fragmented, marked by high inefficiency. - Their staff is limited, thinly spread and under-resources. Turbonomic directly addresses both of these challenges through our intelligent automation, enabling teams to increase the infrastructure’s capacity and the performance of the applications they run (see more in link in signature). With that in mind, we’d like to offer a $15,000 discount for any deal with us, if you install Turbonomic’s autonomic performance platform before the end of May. Do you have 30 minutes for my team and I to provide an introduction to you and the team at Anne Arundel County Public Schools over the next couple of weeks? Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://na01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmkto-sjp0104.com%2Fol%2FjEtQeMPNKFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%252DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%255FqhaGUS1VynmzqPbfYFBZpRy3cJx7OaqymdDv9SGzwyKDFcaUnAxSTK0OLkIqiTeYpwobzeuqFbbMd8hqw4Yh5oI3aKcVKmOz0a5zE7%255Fvxm5DltH0%255FSPxHuRXrRZyt4ui0J0xGcDLtrSymH%252D2J4tkysOpMJu3QVB%255FNEhJu5S%252DRHbDn3i6ansddBDV7HgnPHL7qR9XjYF2oYjUXjTJAKnDr21bBsjqAeKvhtpCDZhfxp%252DLL4CtjGSkFh4YdEDfyeCsB86%255FWJ50pJUh5DRlAmzWSnIC32451Y%252C%2Fj0lZd8PLKllNoVdlsbPWNrz%255FnTrOdZWhuPJ%252DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%255FKjgaMJZE7g9LEeieJJJr%252DNwKHUm5exf4hfTXfZwYKa5Ryflp6oOT7XMcg%252Dilu13APEhLE1UpNyLeZbA3gS%252DqOZ4lTQKU7mnUNpM2ji1FhrIXwoE%252C&data=01%7C01%7CGBARLOW%40AACPS.org%7C7c8ad0fe42a44093c5fc08d49c5ec6dd%7Cb7d27e93356b4ad88a7089c35df207c0%7C0&sdata=1ZfBPLSWtF2usKTD9lPkf6IsUhRfNhqeUbJmYjaQ%2Fpc%3D&reserved=0]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[https://na01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmkto-sjp0104.com%2Fol%2FjEtQeMPNKFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%252DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%255FqhaGUS1VynmzqPbfYFBZpRy3cJx7OaqymdDv9SGzwyKDFcaUnAxSTK0OLkIqiTeYpwobzeuqFbbMd8hqw4Yh5oI3aKcVKmOz0a5zE7%255Fvxm5DltH0%255FSPxHuRXrRZyt4ui0J0xGcDLtrSymH%252D2J4tkysOpMJu3QVB%255FNEhJu5S%252DRHbDn3i6ansddBDV7HgnPHL7qR9XjYF2oYjUXjTJAKnDr21bBsjqAeKvhtpCDZhfxp%252DLL4CtjGSkFh4YdEDfyeCsB86%255FWJ50pJUh5DRlAmzWSnIC32451Y%252C%2Fh01ScsbGdlBQuVN5sfaYL6z%252D0SLJdpuno5xpHOXk3cEx1EF9PO%255FANR7ig8duCJ05OLuGNCM7KZpCxil2GfOedIsY6N5fIhakUDDcrKbfOoBcYOIrxuN0x6Cw81YwucSrp3vlCEM7RzQ%255FQEPOTQ%252C%252C&data=01%7C01%7CGBARLOW%40AACPS.org%7C7c8ad0fe42a44093c5fc08d49c5ec6dd%7Cb7d27e93356b4ad88a7089c35df207c0%7C0&sdata=k%2BlMYcFyndb%2Fc5I63YfN1u94UF3fDPidTufSlKdf%2B%2F0%3D&reserved=0]]> This message and its attachments are intended only for the designated recipient(s).
